overview: True Blue is the story of a screenwriter who leaves for Los Angeles, only to wind up on a porno set. He is drawn to the star that looks a lot like his estranged wife. Kira is true. The movie is blue. You can fill in the rest. Who doesn't love a porno-love story gone all wrong...or does that make it right?
tagline: The true story of a porno. And it's all true.
title: True Blue
